trends: There have been no other sightings in Chiangmai northern of Tha
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is took placed in northern of Thailand(Chiangmai) on 24, May 2013 around 4:30pm. The person who took these pictures is my aunty she is 67years old, she was using i-pad first she try to take a picture of the flowers along the road side when she got out a car and spotted something unusual. And then she try to catch a picture of the unknown object flying ablove her head about 200ft-500ft also over the power line. The object is bright red-orenge colour dosen't has any noice flying accross from East to Northeast with extremely fast speed and the strieght up. She was able to catched 3frames of it, she was in terrified moment. My aunt only know how to do pictures and do onlines she is 67years old don't lie and don't know all about creating apps or fake pictures. Could someone please analyze, identify these pictures if it really a UFO. Note**on the far picture it has 2 shiny spots, it impossible to be a stars because during day time. Best regards, Prin Nimitkul
